name: The Ginger Ninja 64
description:
;----------------------------------;
TITLE:GINGER NINJA 64
Author: MrmediamanX of 3mx digital[2020]
;----------------------------------;
This game is intended to be a throwback to the N64 for the Syntaxbomb Code a game competition[Theme is Reboot,Remake,Sequel,Reimagining]
Original game (The last ginger ninja) created by Qube: https://www.syntaxbomb.com/index.php/topic,3994.0.html
;----------------------------------;

;----------------------------------;
STORY
By the law of the great emperor MU-SI-KU-U-RAH! [muscular] it's stated 
that when his daughter, princess FU-kINO U-GU-RI [F**ken ugly] comes 
of age she will wed a ninja with hair the color of 'sexy hot fire' (not my words).

Unfortunately you are a ninja but also a ginger.
Not wanting to marry that ugly hucker of a princess your now required to embark on an adventure to retrieve to grand items of gin-jut-su in order to break the marriage contract bestowed onto you.
;----------------------------------;  

;----------------------------------; 
CONTROLS
W,A,D = MOVE/TURN
S = BACK_DASH
UP_ARROW = TALK/TARGET/ROTATE_CAMERA WITH A,D
DOWN_ARROW = MELEE ATTACK
LEFT_ARROW = JUMP [HOLD IN MID AIR TO USE NINJA GLIDE]
RIGHT_ARROW = SHOOT/THROW NINJA STAR
P = PAUSE/UNPAUSE
;----------------------------------;
